function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex equations and technical language make it difficult for non-experts to understand the risk assessment.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of risk assessment could lead to incorrect decision-making in disease mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Provide clear and simple explanations of the equations and terminology to enable better understanding by non-experts.","Technologies":"Visualization tools and infographics can be used to present the risk assessment data in a more accessible format.","People":"Non-experts, decision-makers, and stakeholders involved in disease mitigation strategies.","Owner":"Technical experts, communicators, and data visualization specialists."}]}
